description: The aim is to establish better coordination between astronauts, robotic missions, and artificial intelligence.

title: Empowering the Ordinary: Sharad Pawar's Call for Change
description: NCP (SP) president Sharad Pawar emphasizes that talent and leadership aren't exclusive to privileged backgrounds. At the Sharad Pawar Inspire Fellowship award ceremony, he advocates supporting individuals from ordinary families. Highlighting artificial intelligence in agriculture, Pawar champions institutional strength for sustained change and urges addressing women's issues in Maharashtra.
content:
In a powerful address, NCP (SP) president Sharad Pawar underlined the significance of identifying and backing talented individuals from ordinary backgrounds, asserting that leadership isn't confined to the privileged.

title: Ad Agency Stocks Seen Turning AI Disruption to Their Advantage
description: A key stock-market theme of 2025 has been the slide in shares that stand to lose out from advances in artificial intelligence, chief among them being advertising agencies.
content:
(Bloomberg) -- A key stock-market theme of 2025 has been the slide in shares that stand to lose out from advances in artificial intelligence, chief among them being advertising agencies.

title: US arrests gang smuggling US$160m in AI chips to China
description: US authorities have dismantled an illegal operation smuggling advanced artificial intelligence (AI) chips to China, seizing high-performance Nvidia processors worth US$160 million (about 5.6 billion baht). The seized goods primarily consisted of Nvidia's H100 and H200 chips, representing a significant breach of export controls.

title: Indian envoy Vinay Mohan Kwatra discusses AI, defence, trade with US lawmakers
description: India's Ambassador to the US, Vinay Mohan Kwatra, held important meetings with senior Democratic lawmakers. Discussions focused on strengthening India-US ties. Key areas included cooperation in artificial intelligence, defense, and trade. The envoy also explored collaboration on data privacy and security. These engagements aim to foster deeper bilateral relations and mutual interests between the two nations.
content:
